description:
Montreal, Dec. 9, 2013 - Pablo Duboue present the Poisson Magique project, which is a Play-by-Post RPG email gateway and Web interface for the game Call of Cthulhu written in python.

Useful links:
* Poisson Magique: http://sflx.ca/poissonmagique
* Pablo: http://duboue.net
* MP34: http://montrealpython.org/2013/01/mp34/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: The Poisson Magique play-by-email RPG gateway #MP42
